name: Jawa: Mammoth to Himitsu no Ishi
overview: Jawa: Mammoth to Himitsu no Ishi (JAWA〜マンモスとヒミツの石〜, lit. "Jawa: Mammoth and the Stone's Secret") is a video game for the Wii home game console. It was announced at a Nintendo event in Japan leading up to the Wii launch. It is set in the Stone Age and was released in Japan on July 3, 2008.
